dublin_core.dcvalue: This paper describes the design of a prototype integrated mobile telemedicine system that is compatible with existing mobile telecommunications networks and upgradable for use with third generation networks The system when fully developed will enable a doctor to monitor remotely a patient who is free to move around for sports medicine and for emergency situations
IEEE transactions on information technology in biomedicine : a publication of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society
Design of a telemedicine system using a mobile telephone.
